title: Macbook A1707 820-00281 NO Backlight after water damaged
message: This macbook came in wet, after cleaning , its powering with image but no backlight , I quickly ran a diode mode reading on the big caps and 1067 which does not show any short , Can I please get some help ?

title: Macbook A1707 820-00281 NO Backlight after water damaged
message:
Post U8400 basic voltages; pins 5, 18, 17, 11.

Did you try known good LCD assembly?

title: Macbook A1707 820-00281 NO Backlight after water damaged
message:
, U8400

PIN 5 = 5V 
PIN 18 = 5V
PIN 17 = 3.28V
PIN 11= 10.91V

NO, I have not tried a good known LCD yet since I can see imagines. on this one.

title: Macbook A1707 820-00281 NO Backlight after water damaged
message: Let me know what's the next step. sorry my typos ,  I meant to type Images.

title: Macbook A1707 820-00281 NO Backlight after water damaged
message:
Check R8450-53 and their traces.
Post voltage and diode mode on SCL/SDA lines.

Testing with known good LCD assembly is the best to do.
U8400 gets the backlight adjust from T-CON.

title: Macbook A1707 820-00281 NO Backlight after water damaged
message:
R8450/SCL = 0.466   and 4.61V 

R8453 = .0466  AND 5.15V 

R8451 /SDA =0.466= 4.5V

SCL  = 4.61V  

SDA = 4.55V 

All traces are  no damaged or corroded ic, Resistor or caps all is looking clean .I dont have another lcd to test but i continue to see images with a bright light, let me know what's next please 

Thank you.

title: Macbook A1707 820-00281 NO Backlight after water damaged
message: Just Cuious, i got a loose A1706 lcd here , I have one test cable do you think the A1706 would be ok for the test? the fpc connector is looking the same as the A1707 I dont know if that would work at least that would give me an idea of whats going on .

title: Macbook A1707 820-00281 NO Backlight after water damaged
message: Just to give you a heads up, in fact the lcd is my issue , I did the test with my A1706 lcd  And yes backlight system works perfectly fine.

title: Macbook A1707 820-00281 NO Backlight after water damaged
message: Then you have a problem with T-CON, or backlight flex/LED strips of your A1707 LCD assembly.

title: Macbook A1707 820-00281 NO Backlight after water damaged
message: can that be repaired or should i just get a whole new screen?

title: Macbook A1707 820-00281 NO Backlight after water damaged
message:
You can at least inspect backlight connector on the T-CON board.
Also may have only flexgate issue; easy to fix.

title: Macbook A1707 820-00281 NO Backlight after water damaged
message: Really , do you have any tutorial for the flex gate ?

title: Macbook A1707 820-00281 NO Backlight after water damaged
message:
Usually you should note backlight reaction when moving the lid.
If flex is completely broken, may totally lose the backlight.
Youtube is full with flex gate videos; just search.
However, your problem may be different.

title: Macbook A1707 820-00281 NO Backlight after water damaged
